name: react-native-select-contact
summary: A react native company to select a contact from your phone's contact list

script_phases.name: Fix Contact Picket on SwiftUI
script_phases.script: perl -i -pe "BEGIN{undef $/;} s/UIViewController *picker.*:nil];/dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{ UIViewController *picker = [[CNContactPickerViewController alloc] init]; ((CNContactPickerViewController *)picker).delegate = self; UIViewController *root = [UIApplication sharedApplication].keyWindow.rootViewController ? [UIApplication sharedApplication].keyWindow.rootViewController : [[[UIApplication sharedApplication] delegate] window].rootViewController; while(root.presentedViewController) { root = root.presentedViewController; } [root presentViewController:picker animated:YES completion:nil]; });/smg" react-native-select-contact/ios/RCTSelectContact/RCTSelectContact.m
